content:
Redshirt junior guard C.J PERIOD Bryce tries to get around a Wake Forest defender during the game on Tuesday Jan PERIOD  in Lawrence Joel Veterans Memorial Coliseum PERIOD Despite Bryce scoring  points the Wolfpack still lost to the Demon Deacons  PERIOD

The No PERIOD  NC State mens basketball team bounced back after its loss to Wake Forest with a  win over Notre Dame at Joyce Center in South Bend Indiana PERIOD While the Fighting Irishs final lead of the game came just six minutes into the first half NC State never lead by more than eight PERIOD

Redshirt junior guard C.J PERIOD Bryce led the Wolfpack in scoring on the night with  points just five short of his career high PERIOD Redshirt sophomore guard Devon Daniels was also a high impact player on the night energizing his team with a couple of big blocks which helped shift the momentum during a few different Wolfpack shooting slumps PERIOD

The Wolfpack started slow but jumped ahead just after the first media timeout PERIOD For the majority of the rest of the first half the Wolfpack lead by a slim margin PERIOD Bryce scored the basket which gave the Wolfpack its first lead and went on to score a gamehigh  first half points PERIOD

The Fighting Irish ended the half on a strong run cutting the Wolfpack lead to just  after NC State led by as much as eight with just three minutes left in the half PERIOD

NC State began to build on its quick start to the second half with Daniels blocking a shot on the defensive end and sophomore guard Braxton Beverly hit a  in transition to push the Wolfpack lead to six early in the second half PERIOD

Following a threeminute period of not scoring the Wolfpack rallied behind another Daniels block to stay in the drivers seat PERIOD While the lead during this period wasnt large the Wolfpack hadnt trailed in the game since the score was  in favor of the Fighting Irish PERIOD

Despite the fact that the Wolfpack hadnt trailed since the six minute mark the game was still in doubt until the final whistle PERIOD The Fighting Irish scored with just over  seconds left to make it a twopoint game PERIOD

Following the Fighting Irish basket Daniels hit both of his free throws following an intentional foul to put the game to bed PERIOD

The Wolfpack will be back in action on Thursday as it travels to Kentucky to take on Louisville PERIOD
